file.name: request_body_allOf_scenarios.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: RequestBody with AllOf
  description: refComponent
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.{host}.io/v1
    description: The production API server
    variables:
      host:
        default: openapi
        description: this value is assigned by the service provider
  - url: https://{subdomain}.swagger.io:{port}/{basePath}
    description: The production API server
    variables:
      subdomain:
        default: petstore
        description: this value is assigned by the service provider
      port:
        enum:
          - '8443'
          - '443'
        default: '443'
      basePath:
        default: v2
paths:
  /path01:
    post:
      operationId: postXMLUser
      summary: Request Body has nested allOf.
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
                - properties:
                    schedule_for:
                      description: Email or userId if you want to schedule meeting for another user.
                      type: string
                  type: object
                - allOf:
                    - description: Base object for sessions.
                      properties:
                        agenda:
                          description: Meeting description.
                          type: string
                        duration:
                          description: Meeting duration (minutes). Used for scheduled meetings only.
                          type: integer
                        password:
                          type: string
                        recurrence:
                          properties:
                            end_date_time:
                              description: Select the final date on which the meeting will recur before it is
                                canceled. Should be in UTC time, such as
                                2017-11-25T12:00:00Z. (Cannot be used with
                                "end_times".)
                              format: date-time
                              type: string
                            end_times:
                              type: integer
                          type: object
                        settings:
                          allOf:
                            - description: Meeting settings.
                              properties:
                                allow_multiple_devices:
                                  type: boolean
                                alternative_hosts:
                                  type: string
                                approved_or_denied_countries_or_regions:
                                  properties:
                                    approved_list:
                                      description: "List of countries/regions from where participants can join this
                                        meeting. "
                                      items:
                                        type: string
                                      type: array
                                    denied_list:
                                      description: "List of countries/regions from where participants can not join
                                        this meeting. "
                                      items:
                                        type: string
                                      type: array
                                  type: object
                              type: object
                            - properties:
                                registrants_confirmation_email:
                                  description: Send confirmation Email to Registrants
                                  type: boolean
                              type: object
                      type: object
                  description: Meeting object
                  type: object
    put:
      operationId: updateXMLUser
      summary: Request Body has allOf with specific properties.
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              allOf: # Combines the main `User` schema with `RequestBody`-specific properties
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
                - type: object
                  properties:
                    hunts:
                      type: boolean
                    age:
                      type: integer

  /path02:
    post:
      operationId: postXMLUserInLineArray
      summary: Request Body has Array type AllOf.
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                allOf: # Combines the main `User` schema with `RequestBody`-specific properties
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      hunts:
                        type: boolean
                      age:
                        type: integer
components:
  requestBodies:
    PetBody:
      description: A JSON object containing pet information
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
  schemas:
    User:
      type: object
      required:
        - userName
      properties:
        userName:
          type: string
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/path01": post: requestBody: contents: media: "application/json": generate schema: allOf: schema type mismatch: object and
